titles: Observations upon a late libel, called A letter from a person of quality to his friend, concerning the Kings declaration, &c.
author: Halifax, George Savile, Marquis of, 1633-1695.
notes: Attributed to George Savile, 1st Marquis of Halifax, by the editor and in a manuscript note on the copy in the library of Trinity College, Cambridge.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Satiric comments upon the Whigs' reaction to the dissolution of the Oxford Parliament.
keywords: England and Wales. --  Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II). --  His Majesties declaration to all his loving subjects.
Letter from a person of quality to his friend, concerning His Majesties late declaration.
